definition: both principal and interest/capital plus profit
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Soon, just this PR value, it will own with the station to give you.
sentences.chinese: 不久，就這PR值來說，該站會連本帶利地還給你的。

sentences.english: He lent his money to merchants who needed money and asked them to pay back more than they had borrowed.
sentences.chinese: 他把錢借給需要週轉的商人，要他們連本帶利歸還。
